Player History
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,368,000 per year...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/3/1985, off Dwight Gooden (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1985, off Jack O'Connor (MON)...
Injured on 4/28/1985 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against San Diego on 5/26/1986...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,157,143 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,157,143 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,157,143 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Philadelphia to Detroit on 4/26/1989 (Going to PHI: P Scott Garrelts, SS Austin Manahan, CF Rob Deer. Going to DET: P Steve Bedrosian, P Storm Davis, C Mark Salas)...
Was claimed off waivers by Toronto on 5/25/1989.
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,157,143 through salary arbitration...
Released by Toronto on 10/16/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 4/3/1991 to a minor league deal...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 3/3/1992 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 7/13/1993 with a Bruised Neck, out for 4 days...
Injured on 7/19/1993 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 7-8 weeks...
Released by Toronto on 8/17/1993...
